attributes.action: Petition to prevent the summer dissolution of parliament.
attributes.additional_details: Parliament should remain sitting over the summer so they can sort out a plan for Brexit, stabilise the economy and work out how to unify the country. The laclustre illinformed campaigns of both sides and the failure of politicians  to get the remain ,message across as well as the leave campaigners  failure to formulate a coherent plan has led to the uncertainty and instability we face now, this will not be helped by the dissolution of parliament !
attributes.background: The economic and social effects of the referendum has weakened the pound, destabilised the economy and divided the country. This situation will not be helped by parliament taking its customary summer recess.
